description: Smallest positive integer for which n divides a(n)^5.
comments: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^(ceiling(e/5)). - _Christian G. Bower_, May 16 2005A multiplicative companion function n/a(n) = 1,1,1,2,1,1,1,4,3,1,1,2,1,1,1,8,1,... can be defined using the 5th instead of the 4th power in A000190, which differs from A000190 and also from A003557. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 14 2012
links: H. Ibstedt, Surfing on the Ocean of Numbers, Erhus Univ. Press, Vail, 1997.
prog: (PARI) a(n) = my(f=factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,2] = ceil(f[i,2]/5)); factorback(f); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 15 2015
author: R. Muller
